## assign variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
assign: {
    <T, U>(target: T, source: U): T & U;
    <T_1, U_1, V>(target: T_1, source1: U_1, source2: V): T_1 & U_1 & V;
    <T_2, U_2, V_1, W>(target: T_2, source1: U_2, source2: V_1, source3: W): T_2 & U_2 & V_1 & W;
    (target: object, ...sources: any[]): any;
}
```
